title: Hurry hurry [silent]
creator_credit: United World Films and Castle Films
brief_description: Excerpt entitled ‘Hurry hurry’ from the feature film ‘Never give a sucker an even break’ (1941). W.C. Fields offers to drive a woman in a hurry to the maternity hospital. His reckless driving causes her to faint on the back seat as well as leaving a wak of utter bedlam behind him.
